potenergy.f90

00004 !  ===================================================================
00005 !
00006 !                              POTENERGY
00007 !
00008 !   Calculate electrostatic and magnetic potential energies:
00009 !
00010 !  ===================================================================
00011 
00012 subroutine potenergy(epot_total,emag_total)
00013   use physvars
00014   use treevars
00015   implicit none
00016   include 'mpif.h'
00017 
00018   integer :: key2addr        ! Mapping function to get hash table address from key
00019 
00020   integer :: p, i, j, ierr 
00021 
00022   real*8 :: upartial, umag, gamma
00023   real*8, intent(out) :: epot_total, emag_total
00024   logical :: pot_debug=.false.
00025 
00026   epot_total = 0.  ! Global potential energy
00027   emag_total = 0.  ! Global magnetic energy
00028 
00029   !  Sum Potential Energy
00030 
00031   upartial = 0. ! Single PE partial potential energy sum
00032   umag = 0. ! Single PE partial potential energy sum
00033 
00034   do p=1, npp
00035      upartial = upartial + 0.5*q(p)*pot(p)
00036      if (bfields) then
00037         gamma = sqrt(1.0+ux(p)**2+uy(p)**2+uz(p)**2)
00038         umag = umag + 0.5*q(p)/gamma*( ux(p)*ax(p) + uy(p)*ay(p) + uz(p)*az(p) )
00039      endif
00040      if (pot_debug) then
00041         write (ipefile,'(a,i5,a,i5,3f10.3,a,f12.4,a,3f12.5)') & 
00042         'local particle ',p,' label ',pelabel(p),x(p),y(p),q(p),' pot ',pot(p),' mag ',ax(p), ay(p), az(p)
00043      endif
00044   end do
00045 
00046   if (pot_debug) write (ipefile,'(a,1pe11.4)') 'partial PE sum',upartial
00047 
00048 
00049   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(upartial, epot_total,1, MPI_REAL8, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00050   call MPI_ALLREDUCE(umag, emag_total, 1, MPI_REAL8, MPI_SUM, MPI_COMM_WORLD, ierr)
00051 
00052 
00053 end subroutine potenergy
